channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump’s Own Supporters Walked Out On Him In Georgia
item.description: Trump spoke for so long at his Georgia rally that sizable chunks of his supporters got up and left while he was still talking.

item.title: Massachusetts Migrant Housing Costs: Out of Orbit and Hard to Grasp
item.description: Beyond a certain threshold, numbers become abstract and lose their meaningful context. A quick view of the national debt clock which adds $100,000 of national debt every two-and-a-half seconds to America’s current obligations of $35 trillion is virtually impossible to comprehend. To read the rest of the article click here The post Massachusetts Migrant Housing Costs: Out of Orbit and Hard to Grasp appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com .

item.title: Trump Melts Down As Kamala Harris Support Swells
item.description: The Trump campaign reacted to new polling showing that support for Vice President Kamala Harris swelling to new highs by attacking the poll.

item.title: House Passes Resolution Condemning the Biden-Harris Administration’s Failure to Secure the Border
item.description: On July 25, the House of Representatives passed H. Res. 1371, condemning President Biden and Vice President Kamala Harris’ failure to secure the border. The resolution passed the same week that President Biden announced he would not seek a second term. To read the rest of the article click here The post House Passes Resolution Condemning the Biden-Harris Administration’s Failure to Secure the Border appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com .

item.title: Elon Musk Trump PAC Is Under Investigation For Potential Election Law Violations
item.description: Elon Musk's pro-Trump PAC is under investigation in Michigan for potentially illegally collecting voter data.

item.title: A Disastrous Nexus of Biden-Harris Policies: The Afghan Parole Program and Prohibition on Issuing Notices to Appear
item.description: On this date three years ago – July 31, 2021 – the first group of Afghan nationals arrived in the United States after the President Biden’s disastrous withdrawal of U.S. troops from the country. To read the rest of the article click here The post A Disastrous Nexus of Biden-Harris Policies: The Afghan Parole Program and Prohibition on Issuing Notices to Appear appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com .

item.title: Sen. Chris Murphy Shakes Up Fox With The Truth On Kamala Harris And The Border
item.description: Sen. Chris Murphy (D-CT) went on Fox News Sunday and delivered the facts about Vice President Kamala Harris and the border.

item.title: Human Smuggler Who Facilitated Illegal Entry of Thousands of Aliens Indicted
item.description: On July 18, reports surfaced that Abdul Karim Conteh, a national from Sierra Leone, had been indicted and sanctioned in the United States and arrested in Tijuana, Mexico. Conteh ran a smuggling organization that facilitated the transport of thousands of illegal aliens to the United States through Mexico, including many from terrorism hot spots. To [...] The post Human Smuggler Who Facilitated Illegal Entry of Thousands of Aliens Indicted appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com .

item.title: Republican Ex-Government Officials Endorse Kamala Harris
item.description: Republicans, including former Trump administration officials, government secretaries, and governors, are endorsing Vice President Kamala Harris.

item.title: Did Biden Really Say Our Borders are More Secure than When He Took Office?
item.description: Every politician is prone to exaggerating their accomplishments in an attempt to define their legacy in the most positive possible terms. President Biden is certainly no exception. In his address to the nation on Wednesday evening, after he announced his decision to abandon his 2024 reelection bid, the president ticked off a long list of [...] The post Did Biden Really Say Our Borders are More Secure than When He Took Office? appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com .
